About Me

Senior Product Manager & AI Strategist.

I am a Senior Product Manager with 15 years of experience leading both 0-1 and 1-N product development, digital modernization, and large-scale transformation for high-impact, highly regulated environments ranging from government to entertainment.

Throughout my career, I have been recognized for cutting delivery cycles by 90% and boosting user adoption by 50%. My expertise lies in architecting modernized solutions and aligning stakeholders to deliver secure, scalable, and user-centered products.

Expertise

  • Product Strategy & Roadmap Planning
  • Digital Modernization & Cloud Migration
  • Agile Program Management
  • AI/ML Technical Feasibility

I am PMP and CISM certified, and I am passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex organizational challenges.
